alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 19 at 9:43PM AKST until February 22 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions, heavy snow, and light freezing rain possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Yukon Delta. * WHEN...From late Monday night through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could blow items around. A brief period of freezing rain could make surfaces very slippery. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Two storms will impact the area. The first system will arrive late Monday night with a brief break between systems Tuesday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
